select
hnt.htbah, CASE hnt.currentstatus when 1 then '已受理' when 2 then '已初审' when 3 then '已核定' when 4 then '已登簿' when 5 then '已备案' else '未备案' end as CURRENTSTATUS, hnt.basj, c.qymc, c.address, c.yyzz, c.qyfr, c.phone,
concat(concat(hnt.buyer, ','), re.name) as MSR, concat(concat(hnt.sfzh, ','), re.sfzh) as SFZH, hnt.lxdz, p.xmmc, hnt.ysxkz, h.mph, dic.name as fwyt, concat(nvl(h.SCJZMJ,0),'㎡') as SCJZMJ, concat(nvl(h.sctnjzmj,0),'㎡') sctnjzmj, concat(nvl(h.scftjzmj,0),'㎡') scftjzmj, concat(nvl(hnt.dj,0),'元') as dj, concat（nvl(hnt.zj,0),'元') as zj
from house_new_trade hnt
left join associated_company ac on hnt.id = ac.associatedid left join company c on c.id = ac.companyid left join project p on p.company_id = c.id left join h on hnt.houseid = h.id left join dictionary dic on dic.code = h.FWYT1 and dic.type = 'fwyt' left join ljz t1 on h.ljzh = t1.ljzh left join zrz t2 on t1.zrzh = t2.zrzh left join (select t.projectid, wm_concat(to_char(t.name)) as name, wm_concat(to_char(t.sfzh)) as sfzh from relationship t group by t.projectid) re on re.projectid = hnt.id
where hnt.sfzh = #{IdentityCode} and nvl(hnt.iscancel, 0) not in (1, 2)

select t.htbh, CASE t.currentstatus when 1 then '已受理' when 2 then '已初审' when 3 then '已核定' when 4 then '已登簿' when 5 then '已备案' else '未备案' end as currentstatus, t.rwsj, t.bdcqzh, h.ZL, t.jf as cqr, dic1.name as hx, concat(nvl(h.SCJZMJ, 0), '㎡') jzmj, dic.name as FWYT, t.jf, t.jfzjhm, t.yf, t.yfzjhm, concat(nvl(t.zj, 0), '元') as crzj
from house_stock_trade t left join h on t.houseid = h.id left join dictionary dic on dic.code = h.FWYT1 and dic.type = 'fwyt'
left join dictionary dic1 on dic1.code = h.HX and dic1.type = 'hx'
where instr(t.jfzjhm, #{IdentityCode}) > 0 and nvl(t.iscancel, 0) not in (1, 2)
select t.XMMC as LPMC, t.zrzh as LPZH, t.zcs, dic.name as FWYT,t.YSXKZ from zrz t left join dictionary dic on dic.code = t.GHYT and dic.type = 'fwyt' where t.XMMC = #{lpmc}

select z.JZWMC as lpmc ,h.zl,h.SCJZMJ as mj,di.name jsjt,dic.name as yt ,dict.name as jg, case when ( exists(select 1 from dyaq d where d.BDCDYH = h.BDCDYH and d.QSZT='1') or exists(select 1 from cfdj cf where cf.BDCDYH = h.BDCDYH and cf.QSZT='1' ) or (z.AUDITTYPE!=4 and z.datasource=1) ) then '不可销售' else '可销售' end as fwzt from zrz z left join ljz l on z.ZRZH=l.ZRZH left join h on l.LJZH=h.LJZH left join dictionary di on di.type='hx' and di.code=h.HX left join dictionary dic on dic.type='fwyt' and dic.code=h.FWYT1 left join dictionary dict on dict.type='fwjg' and dict.code=l.FWJG1 where (instr(z.XMMC,#{xmmc})>0 or instr(z.JZWMC,#{jzwmc})>0) and h.zt='1'
